title: Clarkesworld Magazine - Science Fiction & Fantasy
author: Julie Dillon
raw_text: Skip to content Issue 83 – August 2013 Cover Art Launch Point Julie Dillon is a science fiction and fantasy illustrator creating art for books and magazines, as well as for her own projects and publications. She has won multiple Chesley awards, two Hugo Awards, and has been nominated for the World Fantasy Award. ISSN 1937-7843 · Clarkesworld Magazine © 2006-2022 Wyrm Publishing. Robot illustration by Serj Iulian.

Skip to content
Issue 83 – August 2013
Cover Art
Launch Point
Julie Dillon is a science fiction and fantasy illustrator creating art for books and magazines, as well as for her own projects and publications. She has won multiple Chesley awards, two Hugo Awards, and has been nominated for the World Fantasy Award.
ISSN 1937-7843 · Clarkesworld Magazine © 2006-2022 Wyrm Publishing. Robot illustration by Serj Iulian.
